changeSet.author: Feshner
changeSet.comment: Update scheduler_task_config to active AutoClose visits
changeSet.sql: UPDATE scheduler_task_config SET start_time = '2011-11-28 10:01:01', start_on_startup = 1, started = 1 where uuid = '8c17b376-1a2b-11e1-a51a-00248140a5eb';

changeSet.author: Oskar Hinc
changeSet.comment: Update patient_identifier_type (Biometrics National Reference Code) to be UNIQUE
changeSet.sql: UPDATE patient_identifier_type SET uniqueness_behavior = 'UNIQUE' where uuid = '5a597bcc-26ad-11e8-b467-0ed5f89f718b';

changeSet.author: Arkadiusz Lalo
changeSet.comment: Add a new concept, which represents a new question about additional LNSP Viral LOAD tests. Additional add concepts which represent possible answers.

changeSet.author: Arkadiusz Lalo
changeSet.comment: Add a new concept, which represents a new question about additional LNSP EID tests. Additional add concepts which represent possible answers.

changeSet.author: jamesfeshner
changeSet.comment: SET uniqueness_behavior to NON_UNIQUE for the Code National identifier
changeSet.sql: UPDATE patient_identifier_type SET uniqueness_behavior = 'NON_UNIQUE' WHERE uuid = '9fb4533d-4fd5-4276-875b-2ab41597f5dd';
